names.english: ointment for replenishing the skin and flesh (topical)
names.commonEnglish: Ointment for Replenishing the Skin and Flesh

actions: Reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
Reduces swelling, eliminates toxins and expels pus.
Resolves toxicity, generates flesh and promotes the healing of sores.
With Xue JIe, Zi Cao, Ma You and beeswax, as an ointment to generate flesh over non-healing ulcers.
Protects the surface of ulcers, prevents decay and generates flesh.
Clears Damp-Heat from the skin and aids the healing of tissues.
With Bai Zhi and Dang Gui, as an ointment for burns or sores.
With Dang Gui, Bai Zhi, Gan Cao and Ma You, topically for itching and irritation from insect bites.
Clears Heat and relieves Fire toxicity.

syndromes: Skin diseases due to Spleen and Kidney Yang Deficiency

symptoms: Low back, knees and abdomen feel weak, cold and painful
Lower abdomen feels cold and painful
Severe: Abdominal ascites Hydrothorax Palpitations Shortness of breath
manifestations.tongueCoat: Thin and white or White and greasy
manifestations.pulse: Deep, thready, weak and maybe slow

notes: Soak Dang Gui and Bai Zhi in sesame oil Ma You for three days. Simmer them until brown before filtering. Add melted honey Feng Mi. When the oil is slightly cooled, add the other ingredients and stir to mix thoroughly. Spread on a piece of gauze and apply to the lesion.
